title: The Slipper and the Rose
brief_description: This is a captivating and enchanting musical version of the world’s best loved and most often told fairy-tale romance - Cinderella. The legendary appeal of this fairy-tale is captured on the night of the Palace Ball when Cinderella makes her breathtaking entrance. The Prince is entranced, but already it is midnight and Cinderella must vanish into the darkness, leaving behind only a tiny glass slipper.
